text:
e="preserve">Chandrakant Chiplunkar Seedi Bambawala was a Hindi comedy television series that aired on SAB TV. The show was premiered on August 18th, 2014, and ended on November 12th, 2014. The show revolved around a fire brigade employee of Marathi origin who belonged to a middle-class family.
The show hit the small screen every week from Monday to Friday at 10 p.m. The TV series showcased the funny incidents in which the firefighter gets involved and which then results in a comedy of errors. Every time he gets trapped into hilarious events, his cosmopolitan friends or family members or his neighbors assist him.
The serial explores the life of the Chiplunkar family and their interesting mix of neighbours who always come together to help each other. The lead protagonist is being played by Prashant Damle, as Chandrakant Chiplunkar, a fire brigade employee. Kavita Lad and Anang Desai played supportive cast in the serial.
